articles.title: Pioneering operation combines cancer surgery and Caesarean - BBC.com
articles.description: Four women have had a landmark two-in-one operation to reduce the inherited risk of ovarian cancer.
articles.content:
Four women giving birth by Caesarean have had surgery to cut their risk of ovarian cancer at the same time, in what doctors say is a documented first. 
The pioneering two-in-one operations, at a Lon… [+4419 chars]

articles.title: NASA's Lucy Spacecraft Discovers 2nd Asteroid During Dinkinesh Flyby - NASA
articles.description: On Nov. 1, NASA’s Lucy spacecraft flew by not just its first asteroid, but its first two. The first images returned by Lucy reveal that the small main belt asteroid Dinkinesh is actually a binary pair.
articles.content: On Nov. 1, NASAs Lucy spacecraft flew by not just its first asteroid, but its first two. The first images returned by Lucy reveal that the small main belt asteroid Dinkinesh is actually a binary pair… [+2769 chars]

articles.author: Rajesh Pandey
articles.title: Apple almost brought the Apple Watch to Android - Android Police
articles.description: The company canceled the project due to business considerations
articles.content:
Summary
  • The Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 and Google Pixel Watch 2 offer all-day battery life and key health tracking, but they can't match the Apple Watch's fitness tracking capabilities.
